content: this simple and sweet tank looks great paired with comfy shorts for a road trip or dressed up for a stylish day in the office begin with basic ribbing then add the classic linen stitch for an endlessly wearable layering piece includes tutorial video size guide the pattern includes the sizes listed below note choose the size most suited to the fit you want the finished tank is designed with 2-4″ of negative ease meaning it is designed to be snug initially and will stretch to a comfortable size yard/skeins account for 2 colors a amber and b cream s finished bust 30″ sized for bust 32-34″ 315/130 yards 3/2 skeins m finished bust 34″ sized for bust 36-38″ 365/155 yards 4/2 skeins l finished bust 38″ sized for bust 40-42″ 425/185 yards 4/2 skeins xl finished bust 42″ sized for bust 44-46″ 495/210 yards 5/2 skeins 2xl finished bust 46″ sized for bust 48-50″ 545/240 yards 5/3 skeins 3xl finished bust 50″ sized for bust 52-54″ 610/260 yards 6/3 skeins 4xl finished bust 54″ sized for bust 56-58″ 660/280 yards / 6/3 skeins
